title: tileentities.yml是什么文件，服务器里的，求解释
author: Minecraft之巅
txt_content:
tileentities.yml
(34.72 KB, 下载次数: 12)



2019-8-1 14:43 上传
点击文件名下载附件

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:
# This is the main configuration file for TileEntities.复制代码
文件的第一行就说明了这个是关于实体方块设置的主要配置文件
如果你要问下面的配置内容是什么意思
那我给你翻译一下吧：
# IRC: #cauldron @ irc.esper.net ( http://webchat.esper.net/?channel=cauldron )
# Forums: http://cauldron.minecraftforge.net/
# 
# Setting: settings.skip-tileentity-ticks Default: true   
# If enabled, turns on tileentity tick skip feature when no players are near.
#如果启用，将在玩家不在实体方块周围时跳过该实体方块的tick
# Setting: debug.enable-te-inventory-warning Default: false   
# Set true to detect which tileentities with inventory failed to detect size for Bukkit's InventoryType enum. 
#设置为true以检测无法被Bukkit的InventoryType枚举类型检测大小的库存
#Note: This may detect a false-positive.
#备注：这个可能会有误报
# Setting: settings.prevent-invalid-tileentity-updates Default: true  
# Used to determine if a tileentity should tick and if not the TE is added to a ban list. Note: This should help improve performance.
#是否开启“如果一个实体方块不应该被tick将会被加入禁止tick的列表”的功能
#备注：这应该能提升服务器的性能
# Setting: debug.enable-te-can-update-warning Default: false  
# Set true to detect which tileentities should not be ticking.
#设置为true将检测那些不需要被tick的实体方块
# Setting: debug.enable-te-place-warning Default: false   
# Warn when a mod requests tile entity from a block that doesn't support one
#是否在一个mod从不支持的方块请求实体方块时显示警告
#
settings:
  skip-tileentity-ticks: true
  prevent-invalid-tileentity-updates: true
debug:
  enable-te-inventory-warning: false
  enable-te-can-update-warning: false
  enable-te-place-warning: false
config-version: 1
world-settings:
  default:
    net-blay09-mods-excompressum-tile-TileEntityHeavySieve:
      tick-no-players: false复制代码
